verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> did tempt <S%H5254><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Abraham: <S%H85><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> here I am.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> your son, <S%H1121><s%> your only <S%H3173><s%> son Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you love, <S%H157><s%> and get <S%H3212><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Moriah; <S%H4179><s%> and offer <S%H5927><s%> him there <S%H8033><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering on one <S%H259><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I will tell <S%H559><s%> you of.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and saddled <S%H2280><s%> his ass, <S%H2543><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of his young <S%H5288><s%> men with him, and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and split <S%H1234><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> for the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and rose <S%H6965><s%> up, and went <S%H3212><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of which God <S%H430><s%> had told <S%H559><s%> him.
Then on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> afar <S%H7350><s%> off.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his young <S%H5288><s%> men, Abide <S%H3427><s%> you here <S%H6311><s%> with the ass; <S%H2543><s%> and I and the lad <S%H5288><s%> will go <S%H3212><s%> yonder <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3541><s%> and worship, <S%H7812><s%> and come <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to you.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> of the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and laid <S%H7760><s%> it on Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son; <S%H1121><s%> and he took <S%H3947><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and a knife; <S%H3979><s%> and they went <S%H3212><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them together. <S%H3162><s%>

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> My father: <S%H1><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> Here <S%H2009><s%> am I, my son. <S%H1121><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> and the wood: <S%H6086><s%> but where <S%H346><s%> is the lamb <S%H7716><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering?

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> My son, <S%H1121><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will provide <S%H7200><s%> himself a lamb <S%H7716><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering: so they went <S%H3212><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them together. <S%H3162><s%>

And they came <S%H935><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had told <S%H559><s%> him of; and Abraham <S%H85><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and laid the wood <S%H6086><s%> in order, <S%H6186><s%> and bound <S%H6123><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> him on <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> on the wood. <S%H6086><s%>
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> stretched <S%H7971><s%> forth his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the knife <S%H3979><s%> to slay <S%H7819><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to him out of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Abraham: <S%H85><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> Here <S%H2009><s%> am I.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Lay <S%H7971><s%> not your hand <S%H3027><s%> on the lad, <S%H5288><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> you any <S%H3972><s%> thing to him: for now <S%H6258><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that you fear <S%H3373><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> seeing you have not withheld <S%H2820><s%> your son, <S%H1121><s%> your only <S%H3162><s%> son from me.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> him a ram <S%H352><s%> caught <S%H270><s%> in a thicket <S%H5442><s%> by his horns: <S%H7161><s%> and Abraham <S%H85><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> him up for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering in the stead <S%H8478><s%> of his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Jehovahjireh: <S%H3070><s%> as it is said <S%H559><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> In the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> it shall be seen. <S%H7200><s%>
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%> out of heaven <S%H8064><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> By myself have I sworn, <S%H7650><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> for because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> and have not withheld <S%H2820><s%> your son, <S%H1121><s%> your only <S%H3173><s%> son:

That in blessing <S%H1288><s%> I will bless <S%H1288><s%> you, and in multiplying <S%H7235><s%> I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and as the sand <S%H2344><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the sea <S%H3220><s%> shore; <S%H8193><s%> and your seed <S%H2233><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his enemies; <S%H341><s%>

And in your seed <S%H2233><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> be blessed; <S%H1288><s%> because <S%H6118><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%>

So Abraham <S%H85><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to his young <S%H5288><s%> men, and they rose <S%H6965><s%> up and went <S%H3212><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> to Beersheba; <S%H884><s%> and Abraham <S%H85><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> at Beersheba. <S%H884><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> that it was told <S%H5046><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> she has also born <S%H3205><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> to your brother <S%H251><s%> Nahor; <S%H5152><s%>
Huz <S%H5780><s%> his firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> and Buz <S%H938><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and Kemuel <S%H7055><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Aram, <S%H758><s%>
And Chesed, <S%H3777><s%> and Hazo, <S%H2375><s%> and Pildash, <S%H6394><s%> and Jidlaph, <S%H3044><s%> and Bethuel. <S%H1328><s%>

And Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Rebekah: <S%H7259><s%> these <S%H428><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> Milcah <S%H4435><s%> did bear <S%H3205><s%> to Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> Abraham's <S%H85><s%> brother. <S%H251><s%>

And his concubine, <S%H6370><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Reumah, <S%H7208><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> also Tebah, <S%H2875><s%> and Gaham, <S%H1514><s%> and Thahash, <S%H8477><s%> and Maachah. <S%H4601><s%>
